item.title: Pakistan says trade deal with US could come within days, Trump admin offers no timeline
item.description: Pakistani Foreign Minister Ishaq Dar said his country was "very close" to a trade deal with the U.S., but officials in Washington did not mention any ...

item.title: USDA to vacate several Washington buildings, relocate staff to regional hubs
item.description: The USDA announced that it will relocate much of its staff in the Washington, D.C., area to five regional hubs and vacate several buildings in the nat...

item.title: State Farm to hike home insurance rates by 27% in this state
item.description: Illinois homeowners face a 27% rate hike from State Farm as the insurer cites unsustainable losses. The rate increase is expected to start on Aug. 15.

item.title: Mortgage rates inch lower this week
item.description: The average rate on the 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.74%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Thursday. That is down fr...

item.title: Court allows women to sue Qatar Airways over alleged strip searches
item.description: Judges overturned a lower court's dismissal, allowing Australian women to sue Qatar Airways and an airport operator over alleged strip searches.
